News.Title: Krishna Defence Forms JV with Vabo for Composite Solutions
News.Summary: Krishna Defence & Allied Industries establishes joint venture with Vabo to develop composite ship doors and hatches, combining Vabo's technical expertise with Krishna's infrastructure capabilities.

News.Title: Krishna Defence & Allied Industries Acquires Stake in Waveoptix
News.Summary: Krishna Defence & Allied Industries has acquired a stake in Waveoptix, a company operating in the SME (Small and Medium Enterprise) sector. This acquisition represents a strategic move by Krishna Defence to expand its portfolio or strengthen its position in the defense and allied industries.

News.Title: Krishna Defence and Allied Industries Secures Major Order
News.Summary: Krishna Defence and Allied Industries has won a significant order worth 88.41 crore rupees. This development is particularly noteworthy as it involves a small and medium enterprise (SME) securing a substantial contract.
